interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: YARELI Organic Castor Oil for Eyelashes, Eyebrows, Hair, Skin and Body - Cold Pressed and Unrefined, 12oz
Review Date: 2021/04/21
Store: YARELI
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Fragrance free', 'Liquid Volume': '12 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'YARELI', 'Package Dimensions': '10.2 x 2.36 x 2.2 inches; 12 Ounces'}
Review Text: Great price for a quality product!  Are use a lot of castor oil in lotions and creams that I formulate myself. I like to use the best quality caster oil I can find and I find this product compatible with brands that I spend the same amount on for a 4 ounce bottle. So I find this to be an amazing value.
Review Title: Great price for a quality product!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Natural Solution
['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
{'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
Not great for exfoliating, but a pleasant experience.  All the salt in this product is less than I would’ve expected and very fine grained so the exfoliation experience isn’t what I expected. What I did like about it was it was not as oily as many of the products that I’ve had in the past. It did leave my skin feeling soft and refreshed. And I do think the price is very reasonable for the quality of the ingredients that are in it. I took one star off for the misrepresentation of the exfoliation product.
Not great for exfoliating, but a pleasant experience
2oz / 60ml Glass Spray Bottles for DIY Refill, Essential Oils, Pillow Mists,Fine Mist Spray -3Packs Amber Color
EagleKing
{'Brand': 'EagleKing', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '2 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '6.3 x 6.1 x 1.7 inches; 8.78 Ounces'}
Sturdy components, good quality glass bottle, sprays a perfect super fine mist.  No complaint at all about the quality, the price...a bit steep even for this quality but I don't find it obscene, hence only one star removed.
Good quality
Argan Magic 100% Pure Argan Oil – Moisturizing Oil that Infuses Skin with Enriched Hydration | Leaves Skin Restored & Refreshed | Non-Greasy | Rich in Vitamin E | Made in USA | Cruelty Free (2 oz)
Argan Magic
{'Brand': 'Argan Magic', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Active Ingredients': 'Vitamin e', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 1.1 x 1.1 inches; 2 Ounces', 'UPC': '605923474046'}
I don't think there is a part of your body that wouldn't benefit from this oil.  I use it on my hair, and mix a bit in my conditioner.  Great for the skin and especially the face.  I also use it for dried cuticles.  Perfect size.
Love this oil!
Pure Active Body Cleansing Shower Wipes, 40 Individually Wrapped Reduced Price Personal Hygiene Body Wipes for Women and Men, XL, Extra Moist for After Gym Travel Camping Outdoors Sports
Pure Active
{'Brand': 'Pure Active', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '40.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '8.39 x 6.81 x 6.57 inches; 2.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '613497909697'}
The Covid answer to post gym workouts!  If I were a gym owner,  I would keep these well in stock! This is a nice big cloth, used to clean up after a workout. It is not dripping wet but it is adequately moist. There is a slight clean scent to it, but nothing perfumy or anything that would fight with a perfume. It did a nice job, however other than doing may be under arms face and chest one of these towels would not be enough if you really wanted to clean yourself up.  These would also be great during camping trips. Or even long car trips when you like to refresh. For what it is, I don’t think the price is unreasonable. If I were a gym owner I would give each patron two of these towels when they arrived. I thought the product was good, the towel was really soft and enjoyable to use.  The towel itself is also as strong as it is soft. I will make sure to have a couple of these in my purse at all times.
The Covid answer to post gym workouts!
Empty Brown Glass Spray Bottles2-Pack, Refillable 16 oz Containers for Essential Oils, Cleaning Products, Aromatherapy, Misting Plants, or Cooking - Reliable Sprayer with Mist and Stream Settings
Cherry
{'Brand': 'Cherry', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.46 x 3.35 inches; 4.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '791523234187'}
Nice quality but overpriced.  The bottle is quality glass, the sprayer is sturdy with multiple functions, you can spray or stream. It even has nice chalk type labels included. They are perfect if you want to make your own natural cleaning supplies, and the dark amber color will protect your essential oil’s, but I feel that the price is way out of line. I’m not debating the quality, the quality is there. The price… Not.
Nice quality but overpriced
6 Pack Portable travel bottles-30ml Flip Cap Reusable Bottles Keychain Carriers for Travel Outdoor Camping Supplies, Metal Buckle Include, Set of 6
SKYCY
{'Package Dimensions': '8.03 x 5.2 x 2.36 inches; 7.05 Ounces', 'UPC': '653552483120'}
I like making my own hand lotions and sanitizers and these little keychain lotion bottle and holders are just adorable for those projects. What’s really nice about them is they make a nice gift for a guy and a lot of these types of holders are way too feminine to give to a guy as a gift. Any patriot would certainly love it.  The price? I found it to be fair for the novelty that it is.
Adorable for DYI gifts
36 Pack 2oz Clear Plastic Empty Bottles Travel Containers with Flip Cap for Hand Sanitizer, Cosmetic, Shampoo, Lotion, Liquid Body Soap, Cream, Toner, BPA-free
JIUZHU
{'Package Dimensions': '12.09 x 10.28 x 3.07 inches; 13.12 Ounces', 'UPC': '667322945817'}
Great for homemade projects!  I would’ve like them to be a little bit more flexible for pushing thicker lotions out. But if you’re going to be putting liquids and it won’t be an issue. Well packaged. I felt it was a decent value.
Great for homemade projects!
Empty Amber Glass Spray Bottles - (4 Pack) 16 oz with Labels Refillable Container for Essential Oils, Cleaning Solutions, Cleaning Products, Hair, Plant Mister, Daily Shower, Gardening or Aromatherapy
AYL
{'Brand': 'AYL', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Number of Items': '4', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 7.6 x 7.17 inches; 2.98 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'EmptyAmberGlassSprayBottles 4 Pack', 'UPC': '860005177202'}
These well made bottles are big and perfect for cleaning solutions.  The sprayer works well and I liked the addition of the metal funnel and the labels.  That being said, $5 each for a glass spray pump bottle is pricey...they back it up with quality, but if your buying 4 of them I think the price should be lower.
Nice quality
8 PCS 40ML Mini Spray Bottles, FANDAMEI Fine Mist Plastic Spray Bottles, Empty Refillable Clear Atomizer for Cleaning, Travel, Essential Oils, Perfume, Makeup Liquids. Travel Size, Pink & Blue
Fandamei
{'Brand': 'Fandamei', 'Material': 'Plastic', 'Capacity': '40 Milliliters', 'Number of Items': '8', 'Special Feature': 'Mist Spray', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 5.79 x 1.42 inches; 5.93 Ounces'}
I used these for a homemade essential oil facial spray.  The mist is really fine which I liked.  It has a double cap which is nice as it stays secure in your purse.  Well constructed and just cute.  I felt for a buck a bottle it was a good value.
Great for DYI projects
ZMCARE 12-Pack, Eco-Friendly 28-410 (28 mm) Lotion Pump for Cosmetics, Hand Wash, Hand Sanitizer, Soap Dispenser Containers — Non-Slip Design — Fits Most 1 liter/33.8 Oz Bottles.
ZMCARE
{'Package Dimensions': '9.06 x 4.84 x 2.28 inches; 6.49 Ounces', 'UPC': '850013484591'}
These pumps are good quality, solid construction meant for larger bottles to pay attention to the type of bottle it fits or you will be unhappy.  The same company sells a smaller pump, set of two for $6 which I found way overpriced so I was surprised to find these pumps so reasonable and a good value.
Great value!

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences**: The user remains committed to natural skincare solutions featuring organic ingredients that promote moisturizing and nourishing benefits. They actively seek out high-quality products, particularly those that offer great value without compromising on effectiveness.

- **Exfoliation Experience**: They favor gentle exfoliation methods that prioritize a pleasant texture over harsh scrubbing.

- **Sensory Feedback**: The user prefers lightweight, non-greasy formulations that provide a refreshing feel and deliver reliable performance.

- **Value Sensitivity**: Recent interactions demonstrate their enthusiasm for value-oriented purchases, especially recognizing good deals that enhance their skincare routines and DIY projects.

- **General Discontent with Expectations**: They critique products that fail to meet their expectations or provide underwhelming results.

- **Compatibility**: They value inclusivity in product choices, preferring solutions that suit all skin types.

- **Moderate Ratings**: Their product ratings reflect an analytical approach, weighing performance against sensory satisfaction.

- **Practicality in Purchases**: The user enjoys multifunctional items and well-packaged products that facilitate their crafting endeavors, highlighting a focus on practicality.

- **Current Focus**: Recent interactions indicate a strong interest in versatile and cost-effective options, particularly in oils that can be integrated into personal care formulations, reinforcing their hands-on approach while emphasizing quality and design appreciation.

Overall, the user continues to prioritize effective, reasonably priced natural products, valuing quality, sensory enjoyment, practicality, and inclusivity in their choices.
